main.name: Sanathkumar Adavayya Swamy
main.bio: I am enthusiastic and highly motivated computer savvy, and I have a massive passion for Software Engineering and Artificial Intelligence areas of computer science. Over the years, I have widened my knowledge by completing multiple personal and class projects using programming languages such as Python, Java, C++ and JavaScript. Apart from the projects, one of my hobbies is exploring and researching cutting-edge technologies such as blockchain, nanotechnology, conversational AI, and robotics.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me about any open oppurtunites or share a thought about my work!

resume.skillmessage: I like to play around with different object oriented programming languages, frameworks and tools. But here are few of them interests me the most.

education.description: Modules Included: Machine Learning, Distributed Computing, Information Visualization. I was awarded Melbourne School of Engineering Scholarship for high achiving grades

education.degree: Bachelors of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: Modules Included: Engineering Mathematics, Physics, Robotics, Software Engineering, Data Structures and Algorithms. My thesis was on Security Enhancement of Smart Lock Systems and Automating Access Control Using BlockChain Technology and I achived a GPA of 8.01 out of 10.

work.title: Universitas 21 Global Citizenship Program Participant
work.description: Completion of Global Citizenship – an experiential asynchronous course where I advanced the UN Sustainable Development Goals, and gained a Pass grade for each of the skills assessments.

work.title: Data Scientist Intern
work.description: Coded and performed various data cleaning and pre-processing techniques on a geo spatial dataset for India's rural area and designed a map utilizing Map box tool and JavaScript Programming. Programming Languages and Tools used: Tableau, Map Box, Python, JavaScript.

work.title: Software Developer Intern
work.description: Led a group of interns in developing a prototype website utilizing ReactJS for a client. Developed a real-time database to update the website using Firebase. Programming language and tools used: JavaScript, Firebase.

projects.title: Detection of Deepfake on Social Media
Romance or Thriller Movie Genre Prediction from Audio Visual and Text Features

testimonials.text: If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it's not.
If you decide that you’re going to do only the things you know are going to work, you’re going to leave a lot of opportunity on the table.
